screens.name: Create_Properties
screens.label: Create Properties
screens.nextOrFinishButtonLabel: Select the Properties and Click here to create them

fields.name: Create_Poperty_Text
fields.fieldText:
In this screen you can create multiple properties or just one

  • If creating more than one. Enter in your properties info and click the next button.
  • Repeat steps to create additional properties
  • Once you are ready, make sure that all of the fields are blank and click next
  • You will be presented with a list of properties, select all or the ones you want to create and then click next button

fields.name: Property_Address_Name
fields.helpText: “Please enter the Name of the Building. For example, the “Chrysler Building” is an example of a Property Name.”

fields.name: Property_Number
fields.helpText: “Please enter the Store Number here. For example, Home Depot has a store number #265 for a specific location. The Suite # or Apartment # goes into the Damage Description section”

fields.name: Error_Message_1
fields.fieldText:
